title: Brazen Affairs
description: My entire life has been one steady plan after another. Go to college.Get married. Have a successful career.More than a decade goes by, and my entire world is rocked in more ways than one. Everything I thought I knew is ripped from under me in one fell swoop.Then I meet him. The enticing man behind the camera with the boyish grin and the charismatic energy that makes me question everything. He was only supposed to be a means to an end. But what I got was so much more.*Brazen Affairs is book one in the Hidden Affairs standalone MM series.
author: Ashley      James
